title: About
intro: Get to know me a little better. We can start here.

sections.heading: My journey
details: I'm a graduate with a Bachelor's degree in Business Finance, but my true passion lies in the world of computers and web development.

Right now, I'm lucky enough to be under the mentorship of Perpetual Education where I'm experimenting with a wide range of coding and design disciplines. I'm constantly pushing myself to learn and grow, and I'm excited to see where this journey will take me.

I've always had an itch to be more creative and express myself, and that's when I discovered the exciting world of Frontend Web Development and design. From the moment I started, I was hooked! I've fully immersed myself into this field and can't wait to expand my knowledge and explore further.

But hey, I'm not all about work! When I'm not busy coding, you'll find me indulging in my other passions. I love playing games, hitting the gym to stay active, and checking out the latest music. And let's not forget, I'm on the hunt for the next best meal!
